meta.title: My Crypto Heroes | Beta Battle test
meta.description: ‘My Crypto Heroes’(MCH) is Beta Battle test now. Heroes acquired through the Pre-sale can be used. You can get some prize! Beta tests will be carried out for each function sequentially.

body.title: Choosing team members
body.body:
Assemble a team using your heroes.
You can include up to 3 heroes in your team.

body.title: Choosing Extensions (Equipment)
body.body:
Heroes can wear up to 2 extensions.
Heroes are strengthened when wearing equipment.

body.title: Rearrange Active Skills
body.body:
Heroes act using Active Skills during their turns. Active Skills are automatically used in top-down order.
Rearrange their order according to your battle plan.

body.title: Choosing opponents
body.body:
Ranks are an indication of the opponent's strength.
The higher the enemy's rank, the greater the potential rewards!

body.title: Battle!
body.body:
Battles are autonomously fought by your team.
Cheer on your heroes and watch over the battle progression!

body.title: Rank Rewards.
body.body:
Your rank will change based on battle results.
Rewards will be granted reflecting your Battle β Test rank once the game is launched.

notice: The heroes and extensions provided are for Battle β Test only.
Heroes purchased in the pre-sale may be used in Battle β Test, however their status and skills will differ after the game is in service.
Free-of-charge heroes and extensions will be withdrawn after Battle β Test ends.
Data from Battle β Test will not be carried over after the game's release.
home.trouble:
[announcement] UTC : 10/9 tue 0:25
There was a problem that I could not play the battle from around UTC 10/8 mon 6:10, but I corrected the problem. You can play now.
We apologize for any inconvenience.
We will strengthen our monitoring system in the future and make efforts to prevent recurrence.
home.update: Currently only a part of battle beta is playable. For details of the function and future update schedule, please see below.
home.login: To play Beta Battle you need to log in to the Loom Network.

warning: Do not use images that may violate third party's intellectual property right in art editing.
The User shall not use the Service to engage in the following acts, or any other act that may possibly be categorized as such acts:
For details, please check the following link "Terms of Service".
prohibited: Acts that violate any applicable laws and regulations, public policy, or the TOS;
Criminal acts, conduct that leads to criminal acts, or conduct that promotes such acts;

Posting information that is harmful to adolescents (as defined in Article 2, Paragraph 3 of the Act on Development of an Environment that Provides Safe and Secure Internet Use for Young People), or luring children to become a partner in sexual acts;
Sending or storing text or images with child pornography or other content that would make other users uncomfortable;
Engaging in any conduct for the purpose of having intercourse with others or an obscene act or encounter;
Sending or storing data about dating with unknown others;
Using false information to register as a user, or otherwise providing or disseminating untruthful information to DJT or third parties through the Service;
Using or selling or purchasing drugs, especially contraband such as stimulants or narcotics, or recommending or encouraging minors to drink, smoke, or gamble;
Encouraging or recommending suicide or self-harm;
Posting content that libels, defames, or insults a third party or content that harms the reputation or credibility of a third party, or other harassing conduct;
Posting expressions that lead to discrimination based on race, ethnicity, gender, creed, social status, place of residence, physical characteristics, medical history, education, or wealth;

Commercial activities outside of the Service, or preparing for such activities by using the Service or data provided through the Service (including selling, or offering to sell, Profiles or private keys outside the Service, irrespective of the type of consideration, but excluding any act that is permitted under the TOS);
Encouraging involvement in political groups or religious organizations, or otherwise engaging in political or religious activity;
Improperly collecting or using other users' personal information;
Infringing on the Intellectual Property Rights and Moral Rights of DJT or a third party;

Creating, distributing, or using an outside program such as a bot or cheat tool (including, but not limited to, outside tools to manipulate the results from using the Service in ways not intended by DJT);
Using the results obtained by a third party from using the type of outside program described above for oneself;
Improperly manipulating the results obtained from using the Service by oneself or in collaboration with another user, or by taking advantage of another user's actions;
Putting a significant burden on the servers or networks used to run the Service;
Engaging in any unauthorized access;
Deliberately providing or disclosing information about deficiencies in the Service to a third party other than DJT;
Posing as DJT, another user, or another individual or organization associated with the Service, or otherwise somehow misleading a third party about one's association with the Service;
Distributing computer viruses;
Modifying, damaging, disassembling, decompiling, or reverse engineering the program used in the Service;
Modifying, damaging, disassembling, decompiling, or reverse engineering the OS installed on the device (including rooting or jailbreaking a device);
Harming or otherwise somehow inconveniencing DJT or a third party;
Interfering with the normal delivery of the Service;
Damaging the credibility of DJT or the Service; or
Any other act that DJT determines to be improper;
